AddressLine.description: SoldTo locations street address.  Applies to NAFTA CO.

StateProvinceCode.description: SoldTo locations state or province code.  Required for certain countries or territories.

CountryCode.description: SoldTo locations country or territory code.

ResidentialAddressIndicator.description:
This field is a flag to indicate if the receiver is a residential location. 
True if ResidentialAddressIndicator tag exists; false otherwise.  This is an empty tag, any value inside is ignored.

POBoxIndicator.description:
This field is a flag to indicate if the receiver address has PO box indicator. 
True if POBoxIndicator tag exists; false otherwise.  POBoxIndicator is not valid for AlternateDeliveryAddress.
